title: Nominations by the President sent to the Senate, 6-10-09 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




June 10, 2009

 



Nominations by the President sent to the Senate, 6-10-09




THE WHITE HOUSE    Office of the Press Secretary   ________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                              June 10, 2009   NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:      Robert V. Abbey, of Nevada, to be Director of the Bureau of Land Management, vice James L. Caswell, resigned.    Harry R. Hoglander, of Massachusetts, to be a Member of the National Mediation Board for a term expiring July 1, 2011. (Reappointment)    Timothy J. Roemer, of Indiana, to be Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the United States of America to India.
